text: P.S Sreedharan Pillai (born 1 December 1954) is an Indian politician. He was the 15th Governor of Mizoram. He was appointed by President Ram Nath Kovind in October 2019. He later became the Governor of Goa in July 2021. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Mizoram Category:Governors of Goa
title: P. S. Sreedharan Pillai
